summary: This again follows rumours in 2024 about NetherRealm supposedly axing its plans for a second story expansion and third Kombat Pack. This version of the game, which is available for $59.99 USD (or your regional equivalent), is said to offer the "most extensive Mortal Kombat 1 experience" including not only the base game and more recent Khaos Reigns story expansion but also both Kombat Packs (including all of the DLC fighters so far). Alongside this announcement is a "May Hotfix" update which contains character and Kameo Fighter adjustments.
